sourcesContent:
<template>
  <navbar
        :pages="pages"
        :active-page="activePage"
        :nav-link-click="(index) => activePage = index"
    ></navbar>

    <page-viewer
      v-if="pages.length > 0"
      :page="pages[activePage]"
    ></page-viewer>

</template>

<script>
import Navbar from './components/Navbar.vue';
import PageViewer from './components/PageViewer.vue';

export default{
  components: {
    Navbar,
    PageViewer
  },
  created() {
    this.getPages();
  },
  data() {
    return {
      activePage: 0,
      pages: []
    }
  },
  methods: {
    async getPages() {
      let res = await fetch('pages.json');
      let data = await res.json();

      this.pages = data;
    }
    storeThemeSetting() {
      localStroage.setItem('theme', this.theme);
    }
  }
}
</script>
